title: Discussion about bitmap fonts: questions, maybe answers
content:
I am in need of more information about creating and editing bitmap fonts for multiple platforms.

Softy works excellently for the PC, and Linux has several good programs, but I know of no free (or reasonably priced) font editor for the Macintosh that will either convert or create bitmap fonts. If you know of one, please let me know.
